frontmatter.title: The Bindgen tool
frontmatter.description: The Bindgen tool is a CLI tool that generates Ballerina bindings for Java classes.
frontmatter.keywords: ballerina, programming language, java, interoperability, bindgen
frontmatter.intro: The Bindgen tool is a CLI tool that generates Ballerina bindings for Java classes.

pageProps.codes:
[[-1853693049,"
$ bal bindgen [(-cp|--classpath) <classpath>...]
                  [(-mvn|--maven) <groupId>:<artifactId>:<version>]
                  [(-o|--output) <output-path>]
                  [--public]
                  [--with-optional-types]
                  [--with-optional-types-param]
                  [--with-optional-types-return]
                  (<class-name>...)
"],[1476588218,"
<module-dir>
    ├── <class-name>.bal // generated classes
    ├── ...
    ├── <class-name>.bal // generated dependent classes
    ├── ...
    ├── <class-name>.bal // generated error types
    └── ...
"],[-108681899,"
@java:Binding {
    'class: "java.util.ArrayDeque"
}
distinct class ArrayDeque {

    *java:JObject;
    *AbstractCollection;

    public handle jObj;

    function init(handle obj) {
        self.jObj = obj;
    }

    ...
};

"],[-1335764795,"
function read() returns int|IOException {
    int|error externalObj = java_io_FileInputStream_read(self.jObj);
    if (externalObj is error) {
        IOException e = error IOException(IOEXCEPTION, externalObj, message = externalObj.message());
        return e;
    } else {
        return externalObj;
    }
}
"],[-546864680,"
distinct class List {

    *java:JObject;

    public handle jObj;

    function init(handle obj) {
        self.jObj = obj;
    }

    function toString() returns string {
        return java:toString(self.jObj) ?: "null";
    }
};
